title: Metropolitanos F.C.
text:
Metropolitanos de Caracas Fútbol Club is a Venezuelan professional <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Caracas">Caracas</a>.
They were promoted to the <a href="Venezuelan%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Venezuelan Primera División</a> in 2013.
